title: A financial OS for the 99% - now!
description: How can we fast track the delivery of the first benefits of a global financial OS to the average citizen of the world in the next 6 months?

f6_assessments.q0:
Using Cardano to bring financial services to non-technical citizens of the world aligns with the Cardano mission of driving adoption of Cardano however this is a broad challenge that overlaps several existing challenges. The geographically specific challenges combined with the DeFi and Dapps challenges cover everything in this challenge.
I neither agree nor disagree that this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
The Catalyst community has the skillset to address the challenge however given the overlap this challenge has with several other challenges there may be limited capacity for quality proposals.
I agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question.
The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria but are not measurable.  
I  neither agree nor disagree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with this proposal being important because understanding of advanced Gen 3 blockchain technology is still a privilege of the relative few who are able to understand and benefit. In order to enable global acceptance of the Cardano system it needs to be accessible and easy to use for all. It should expand rapidly, and lower barriers for access and use by the common man who has no IT or blockchain skills. It is ease of use, and unambiguous understanding of the value, even if they dont understand the technology behind it.  People value the IPhone without needing to understand all the technology. They love the value, the ease of use and the aesthetic value of it. No one cares what software is running or what components are doing what..
f6_assessments.q1: The budget for this project is reasonable
f6_assessments.q2:
The Verifiability of this is clear. Metrics would include
 
- New products, tools, use cases and services are provided for the technically less minded

- New ways of presenting benefits of Cardano to average citizens around the world emerge

- New sources of information are provided that are not aimed at the young and technically-minded, but instead address real-life concerns of average person

- Paper wallets and other ideas for simple use are made easier and simpler to use

- The philosophy, logic and monetary policy of Cardano and its core advantages are explained in ways understandable to the ordinary person on the street

- Common doubts are addressed and risks are fully acknowledged and identified

- Research is conducted into common fears, misapprehensions, and prejudices that exist in relation to Cardano specifically and cryptocurrencies in general

- Comparison websites and other educational materials are created to provide a clear, true and fair analysis and comparison  of pros and cons of Cardano vs Fiat money in the short-term, mid-term and long-term

- Examples of ordinary citizens successfully using Cardano to solve problems are promoted 

- New courses are developed aimed at educating ordinary citizens on how to harness the power of decentralized exchanges, decentralized finance, staking and how to manage Cardano-related risks

importance: Understanding of advanced Gen 3 blockchain technology is still a privilege of the relative few who are able to understand and benefit
success: Faster expansion, lower barriers for using Cardano, trust, removal of hurdles blocking average citizens from using Cardano
